tutorial.1: Hold and move the left pad to move around
tutorial.2: Now hold and move the right pad to change the shoot direction
tutorial.3: Good! Now try using both pads together
tutorial.4: There's a zombie around, kill him!
tutorial.5: Pick up the bonus to improve your weapon
tutorial.7: You'll earn coins every 100 points, use them to equip your panda
